channel.title: Timers [delta]
channel.description:
hello, i was wondering if anybody knew how to make a timer for example i want to use the void makeglobalobject but i want the object to be created after an emote happens. does anybody know what should i do? i've searched most of my code, and i haven't found anything useful. base: [size=5]delta[/size]. thaanks :D
snippet: [code] setAnimation(733); i want this animation to be finished bfore the object appears. makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); i want this object created after the animation[/code]

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You should read up on timers, it’s useful. They’re so basic it’s not even funny.

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.5.0/docs/api/javax/swing/Timer.html
